actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the secretary of Veterans Affairs should request assistance from the Commissioner of Social Security in fulfilling the Secretary's mandate to provide outreach to veterans, their dependants, and their survivors.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Veterans Affairs should request specified assistance from the Commissioner of Social Security in fulfilling the Secretary's mandate to provide outreach to veterans and their dependents and survivors, including the use of certain Social Security notices to publicize veterans' benefits information.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the secretary of Veterans Affairs should request assistance from the Commissioner of Social Security in fulfilling the Secretary's mandate to provide outreach to veterans, their dependants, and their survivors.
